content.rendered:
Supplier Vendor Application

Power Plant Services is always ready for opportunity to serve both new and existing customers’ needs, delivering expertise and knowledge where it counts

As part of our supplier quality assurance program, and in accordance with the requirements of our AS9100D & ISO 9001 2015 registration, new and periodic assessments are conducted of our suppliers and sub-contractors. To this end, would you please complete and return the attached vendor questionnaire.

Information from this questionnaire will be used to update our records and enable us to maintain our approved supplier list.

Analysis of this information may result in the need for an assessment or audit by one of our Quality Assurance staff. In this event, we would contact you to arrange a convenient date.

POWER PLANT SERVICES and its employee or assigns will hold the information gathered with this questionnaire in the strictest confidence.



Power Plant Services’ Headquarters:

3131 W Soffel Ave,
Melrose Park, IL 60160
Email: sales@ppsvcs.com
Phone: (708) 345-8600

» Click here to see other locations




Supplier Vendor Application

Instructions: The following questions are used in part to access your companies’ ability to supply product or services to POWER PLANT SERVICES.

Failure to provide the requested information may mean disqualification from consideration.

We will contact to request additional information once we have received this completed form.

Step 1 of 7

14%
Registered Place of Business Address(Required)

FORM SUBMITTER CONTACT INFO - As the submitter of this form, please enter your personal information:
Name (submitter)(Required)

Does this company belong to a group of companies? If yes, please list the company name

Does the company have several plants?

Does the company have any subsidiaries?

Do you have a Quality Manual?

Do you have an internal and external audit program?

Do you have a staff training program/matrix?
The following questions relate to your Purchasing Process.

Do you have a controlled list of approved suppliers?

Are your suppliers assessed and monitored?

Are order quality requirements clearly defined?

Are your suppliers in contract with you?
INSPECTION PROCESS - The following questions relate to your Inspection Process:

Are there documented procedures for the inspection and testing of the products or processes provided?

Are there documented procedures for in-process inspection?

Are incoming products and raw material inspected upon receipt?

Is acceptance/rejection criteria defined?

Are rejected items identified and segregated?

Are process cards used for monitoring product inspection and test activities at each stage?

Are QA stamps used and controlled?

Are Statistical Process Control (SPC) techniques used for control of processes?

Are monitoring and measuring devices controlled and calibrated?

Do you have a procedure on Design and Development processes?

Do you have full/ partial trace-ability of product and materials? Please specify:
PRODUCT HANDLING PROCESS - Following Questions Relate to your Product Handling Process:

Do you have a procedure on handling and storage of products?

Are shelf life products controlled and monitored?

Do you have a procedure for controlling customer property?

Do you have a configuration control system?

Do you have a procedure to confirm customer documents are at correct revision before being issued for use?

Do you have a procedure to confirm customer documents are at correct revision before being issued for use?

Do you have a procedure for controlling changes to customer product?

Is non-conforming material clearly identified?

Are ambiguities documented and approved by the customer?

Do you have a formal customer complaint procedure?

Are there documented procedures for corrective and preventative actions?

Would you permit access to PPS personnel to audit your Quality Management System and processes?

Can we request a copy of your Quality Manual?

Do you prevent any unauthorized "deemed exports" of ITAR and EAR controlled products and technical data to unauthorized persons?

STANDARDS / CERTIFICATIONS/ APPROVALS - The following questions are regarding Standards/ Certifications/ Approvals:

Are you ISO 9001:2015? If yes, please provide who it was accredited by and the certification # (if any)

Are you AS9100 D certified?

If welding is performed, are welders independently certified for competence?

Any OEM Approvals please list below

Customer Approvals, please list below:
HEALTH & SAFETY - The following questions are regarding Health & Safety:

Do you have an accredited Health and Safety and Program? If yes please provide what accreditation.

Do you have a Health and Safety Policy?

Are all employees Site Safe Trained?

Are Subcontractors required to be Site Safe?

Do you have a Site-Specific Health and Safety Officer?

Do you have procedures for- Emergency Readiness?

Do you have procedures for- Employee Participation?

Do you have procedures for- Accident Investigation?

Do you have procedures for- Rehabilitation / Return to Work?

Do you have Certified First Aid team member on site?

Are employees trained in Manual Handling?

Has there been any cautionary prosecution issued by an enforcement authority?
KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS - Following Questions Regarding Key Performance Indicators in the last 12 months:

Have there been any accidents in the last 12 months?

Has anyone been seriously harmed in the last 12 months? If so, how many?

Max. file size: 100 MB.
BEFORE SUBMITTING THIS FORM: Please make sure you have answered ALL the questions as completely as possible. Omitting information on the form will only serve to delay the verification and approval process.

This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
